Author: sweetchiliyeet
Text: same.  i have actual nightmares about this exact thing.  honestly, i think the breaking point for me developing an ed was when my dad told me that he used to be skinny and eat lots of junk like i did at that time, until his metabolism slowed down (from getting old i guess) and ever since he told me that i’ve had this fear that snowballed into this.  most of my family is pretty overweight, so i guess that probably doesn’t help.  oof, sorry for rambling lol, but yeah, i relate.
